name: Little Dreams (Evengy)
description:
Use Left Mouse Button to pick a note.

The goal is to reach maximum score.

Follow a given order and you'll increase the score. If you will pick a note not following the order, your score will be decreased. A pick of something that does not follow the Law will reset the score.

Sound effects by: 'Aural Space', 'Olivier Girardot'

Music by: 'Sosu-Meikyu'

Assets are made for this jam using adobe Illustrator

 

Theme: Law and Order

Time: 3h 15m
